reviews.review_msg: Nice prof, cared about you and answered questions. Frequently went over time.
Dr. Atakora is the best professor ever. He is genuinely so considerate and understanding. 100% recommend.

I took FREN 101 online with Anas, I definitely recommend him! It's an easy class, a GPA booster, do all the homework assigned (very easy, clear grading criteria, and he grades very generously) and you'll be fine. He's very kind if you reach out with any clarifying questions, he genuinely wants his students to succeed. J'adore!

I took FREN 101 with Prof. Anas in the Fall of 2024. He graded my assignments himself instead of the TAs and was an easy marker. The quizzes were straightforward and fair. I'd highly recommend this course to those looking to boost their GPA!
